methods.name: create
methods.full_description:
It uploads values to the project.

It accepts item description and array of values. If there is no item with the specified SKU it will be created.

Successfull request responds with 201 status code and returns array of uploaded values. Otherwise see error codes list.

params.name: item
params.description: Description of a new or the existing item

params.name: values
params.validator: Must be an Array of nested elements

params.name: value
params.validator: Must be one of: Integer, Float.

params.name: timestamp
params.validator: Must be one of: Date, Time.

methods.name: destroy_all

apis.short_description: Destroy all the values of the selected item

methods.full_description: Successfull request destroys all the value of the specified item and respond with 204 status code
examples:
// DELETE /v1/projects/my-shop/items/shampoo/values
// Responds with empty body and 204 status code
